info.plot: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.
The story deals with the characters Pistolero, the Gent and Comanche and the deadly, unfinished business among them.
A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.
Two friends try sharing an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.
A hot shot Washington DC lobbyist and his protege go down hard as their schemes to peddle influence lead to corruption and murder.
An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave, becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.
'Breakin': A struggling young jazz dancer (Lucinda Dickey) meets up with two break-dancers. Together they become the sensation of the street crowds. Features ICE-T in his film debut as a club MC.
After a childhood friend's death, Jake Taylor, an all-star athlete must change his life - and sacrifice his dreams to save the lives of others.

As sadomasochistic yakuza enforcer Kakihara searches for his missing boss he comes across Ichi, a repressed and psychotic killer who may be able to inflict levels of pain that Kakihara has only dreamed of.
A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.
A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.
The true-life story of Paul Ferris.
The first daughter of the U.S. President heads off to college where she falls for a graduate student with a secret agenda.
A Parisian tailor finds himself posing as a baron in order to collect a sizeable bill from an aristocrat, only to fall in love with an aloof young princess.
A guy in his mid-thirties watches as his life comically unravels after he enters into a relationship with the daughter of a former high school classmate.
A woman's world is rocked when she discovers her husband is cheating on her.
An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when an eight year old version of himself mysteriously appears.
British mountain climber, George Mallory, makes multiple attempts to scale Mt. Everest throughout the 1920s.

title: Things We Lost in the Fire

info.plot: A recent widow invites her husband's troubled best friend to live with her and her two children. As he gradually turns his life around, he helps the family cope and confront their loss.
Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.
When a teen is bullied, his brother and friends lure the bully into the woods to seek vengeance.

A grieving father in a downward spiral stumbles across a box of his recently deceased son's demo tapes and lyrics. Shocked by the discovery of this unknown talent, he forms a band in the hope of finding some catharsis.
Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing.

When a Vienna museum guard befriends an enigmatic visitor, the grand Kunsthistorisches Art Museum becomes a mysterious crossroads which sparks explorations of their lives, the city, and the ways artworks reflect and shape the world.
As Allen Ginsberg talks about his life and art, his most famous poem is illustrated in animation while the obscenity trial of the work is dramatized.

This film is an adaptation of the Shakespeare play "Titus Andronicus." Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family. Who says revenge is sweet?
A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.
A ghost tries to sabotage her former boyfriend's current relationship with a psychic.
Before leaving for college, a recently dumped goth girl's life changes forever when she falls in love with a smart and professional college grad who is staying in the family's guest house.
An ad executive comes up with a campaign to defeat Augusto Pinochet in Chile's 1988 referendum.
Mischievous grandma Madea lands in jail, where she meets a variety of mixed-up characters.
Zane, an astronomer discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

title: The Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box

info.plot: The new kid in town stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.
In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle vs. the Nazi Germany Air Force for control of British air space to prevent a Nazi invasion of Britain.
A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.
Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

A group of delinquents are sent to clean the Blackwell Hotel. Little do they know reclusive psychopath Jacob Goodnight (Jacobs) has holed away in the rotting hotel. When one of the teens is captured, those who remain -- a group that includes the cop who put a bullet in Goodnight's head four years ago -- band together to survive against the brutal killer.
A college professor travels to New York City to attend a conference and finds a young couple living in his apartment.

During the First World War, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German POW camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are sent to a seemingly impenetrable fortress which seems impossible to escape from.
An unusual road trip movie about a mother driving her two sons from New York to Pittsburgh to St. Louis and eventually Hollywood in her quest to find a man to take care of them all.
A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.
An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President seriously, and embarks on a cross-country journey.

A cowardly boy who buries himself in accident statistics enters a library to escape a storm only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real life.

In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.
This is the story of a dysfunctional New York family, and their attempts to reconcile.
A young teenage werewolf (Bruckner) is torn between honoring her family's secret and her love for a man (Dancy).
The true story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was found he had fabricated over half of his articles.

Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.
An classical art professor and collector, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.
A group of recruits go through Advanced Infantry Training at Fort Polk, Louisiana's infamous Tigerland, last stop before Vietnam for tens of thousands of young men in 1971.
A father tries to track down his kidnapped daughter.
A group of friends get together for a murder mystery party, but things take a dark turn when one hijacks the evening and is out for blood.
A struggling agent for child actors and former child star himself, Howard Holloway spends years losing his most talented clients to his slick, arch-nemesis Aldo Shocklee.
The tiny girl meets a fairy prince who saves her from the creatures of the woods.
A rich college kid is taught a lesson after a joy ride ends up destroying a country restaurant.
Film version of Jacqueline Susann's best-selling novel chronicling the rise and fall of three young ladies in show business.
The romance between two teenagers turns obsessive, dark, and disastrous.
The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken total control over the building of a media mogul.
A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.
During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.
A leukemia patient attempts to end a 20-year feud with her sister to get her bone marrow.

A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.
A teenager is cast in the Mercury Theatre production of "Julius Caesar" directed by a young Orson Welles in 1937.
A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.
After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his watergun, he's magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.
Freddy Krueger returns once again to haunt both the dreams of his daughter and Springwood's last surviving teenager.
Logline is being kept under wraps.
The story of a girl who makes dreams come true.
Plot unknown.

In the ironically named city of Paradise, a recently laid-off loser teams up with his cult-leading uncle to steal a peculiar bounty of riches from their local amusement park; somehow, the recently arrived Taliban have a similar focus, but a far more sinister intent.
A guy tries to determine what he will do in the final moments of his life.
3 people marooned on a desert island, only one will survive.
Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.

title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus

info.plot: Turning her back on her wealthy, established family, Diane Arbus falls in love with Lionel Sweeney, an enigmatic mentor who introduces Arbus to the marginalized people who help her become one of the most revered photographers of the twentieth century.
In 1890s London, two friends use the same pseudonym ("Ernest") for their on-the-sly activities. Hilarity ensues.
An acclaimed college hoops coach is demoted to a junior varsity team after a public meltdown.
In 1976, Tony Wilson sets up Factory Records and brings Manchester's music to the world.
A computer programmer's dream job at a hot Portland-based firm turns nightmarish when he discovers his boss has a secret and ruthless means of dispatching anti-trust problems.
A meek milquetoast of a clerk is mistaken for Public Enemy #1, and the notorious killer takes advantage of the situation.
A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.
"Juice" is about 4 inner-city teens who get caught up in the pursuit of power and happiness, which they refer to as 'the juice'.
A loser finds success in the revenge-for-hire business.
A bitter ex-husband. A put upon momma's boy. Both want their respective spouse and mother dead, but who will pull it off?
The original '70s TV family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.
When their daughter is kidnapped by experienced nappers (Bacon and Love), the Jennings' (Theron and Townsend) turn the tables on this seemingly foolproof plan.
An engaged couple's backpacking trip in the Caucasus Mountains is derailed by a single misstep that threatens to undo everything the pair believed about each other and about themselves.
A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.
A look at the life-changing connection between a retired and widowed American philosophy professor and a young Parisian woman.
Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogamil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.
Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.
Filmmaker [link=nm0601619] explores the roots of America's predilection for gun violence.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master

info.plot: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may know the way to defeat him for good.
A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and protect their new home.
After his wife is murdered, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.
A cynically selfish TV executive gets haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.
A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.
When the Russian mob kidnaps the daughter of a reformed criminal, he rounds up his old crew and seeks his own brand of justice.
A teenager attends a fantasy writers' convention where he discovers his idea has been stolen by an established novelist.
A traveling art saleswoman tries to shake off a flaky motel manager who falls for her and won't leave her alone.
A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

When a colossal tectonic shift causes the sea level to start rising, a microbiologist gathers the DNA of as many species as she can, while the military creates an "ark" in a desperate attempt to preserve life on Earth.

title: So I Married an Axe Murderer

info.plot: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment has a girlfriend who he suspects may not be who she appears.
A local public station gets a new owner. The station becomes a hit, with all sorts of hilarious sight gags and wacky humor.
The gritty adaption of William Shakespeare's play about the English King's bloody conquest of France.
After leaving jail, Victor is still in love with Elena, but she's married to the former cop -now basketball player- who became paralysed by a shot from Victor's gun...
A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.
When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.
A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug- and organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.
In 30's New York City, the Shadow battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan, who is building an atomic bomb.
A group of six ex-high school cheerleaders are stalked by a killer with a medieval war hammer and battle axe during their first Spring Break from college.
When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.
At the opening party of a collosal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.
A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape, when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.
English naturalist Charles Darwin struggles to find a balance between his revolutionary theories on evolution and the relationship with religious wife, whose faith contradicts his work.

Michael Moore's view on what happened to the United States after September 11; and how the Bush Administration allegedly used the tragic event to push forward its agenda for unjust wars in Afghanistan and Iraq.

Dolph Springer wakes up one morning to realize he has lost the love of his life, his dog, Paul. During his quest to get Paul (and his life) back, Dolph radically changes the lives of others -- risking his sanity all the while.

title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch

info.plot: A large Halloween mask-making company has plans to kill millions of American children with something sinister hidden in Halloween masks.
A young cattle farmer is approached by a veterinarian to make a deal with a notorious beef trader.
Two cops, played by Seagal and Wayans, are forced to work together to solve a chain of mysterious killings by a killer nicknamed "The Family Man"
Rahul loses his fans and fame due to alcoholism. But he then decides to turn a small time singer into a rising star.
A psychological thriller based on the concept of anamorphosis, a painting technique that manipulates the laws of perspective to create two competing images on a single canvas.
The weeks leading up to a young couple's wedding is comic and stressful, especially as their respective fathers try to lay to rest their feud.
After watching their best friend get murdered, a group of teens struggle to expose a local hero as the vicious killer and keep from becoming his next victims.
A mentally retarded girl proves herself to be every bit as capable as her "perfect" sister when she moves into an apartment and begins going to college.

title: I Think I Love My Wife

info.plot: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend.
A French woman mourning over the death of her husband three years prior is courted by a Swedish co-worker.
Final entry in a trilogy of films dealing with contemporary French society concerns a model who discovers her neighbour is keen on invading people's privacy.
A genius 16-year-old 18th century poet and his mentor fall for each other, but, over time, their romantic relationship becomes bitter and violent.
A group of slackers who are living for free in a rock star's mansion find their sweet lives threatened when the musician decides to sell his pad.
A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between a serial killing spree and the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.
Insightful look at an unattractive 7th grader as she struggles to cope with un-attentive parents, snobbish classmates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister, and her own insecurities.
A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.
An American intern at U.K. Vogue helps her friends find love.
Mommie Dearest, best selling memoir, turned motion picture, depicts the abusive and traumatic adoptive upbringing of Christina Crawford at the hands of her mother...screen queen Joan Crawford.

While planning her family reunion, a pistol-packing grandma (Perry) must contend with the other dramas on her plate, including the runaway who has been placed under her care, and her love-troubled nieces.
A twenty-nine year-old slacker who lives with his mom realizes his sweet set-up is threatened when she hears wedding bells with her self-help guru beau.
Alejandra and her dad Roberto have just moved to town. She is new at school, he has a new job. Starting over is sometimes complicated when you have left so much behind.
A teenage boy's descent into the dangerous world of the Internet and the harrowing consequences of his actions. A true story.
In modern-day Paris, a journalist finds her life becoming entwined with a young girl whose family was torn apart during the notorious Vel' d'Hiv Roundup in 1942.
A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.
A florist, who abides by a strict five-date-limit with any man, finds herself wanting more with the new restaurateur in town.
Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

On the run with the law on their trail, America's most anguished vampire family heads to England to find an ancient vampire clan. What they find instead could tear their family, and their throats, apart forever.
An Arab immigrant wins the American green card lottery, arriving in New York City on September 10, 2001.

Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.
After entering a beauty contest in Tijuana, a young woman witnesses drug-related murders and is forced to do the gang's bidding.
Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.
The picaresque and touching story of the politically incorrect, fully lived life of the impulsive, irascible and fearlessly blunt Barney Panofsky.
A road trip through Louisiana transforms three strangers who were originally brought together by their respective feelings of loneliness.
A day in the life of a group of troubled 15-year-olds growing up in west London.
An Irish immigrant family adjusts to life in the United States.
The plot is unknown at this time.
Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.
Set over the course of one day, a narcotics detective hunts for a seemingly harmless young criminal who knows a truth about the cop's past.
Three college students set out to document what other people dread most.
After losing his job, a journalist reluctantly agrees to help his oddball friend with his bid to earn a seat on the Seattle City Council.
A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum.
The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.
Biography of Loretta Lynn, a country and western singer that came from poverty to fame.
Two women are arrested for smuggling while vacationing in Thailand.
A young married couple comes home from a date night to discover that they are imprisoned in their own house with a methodical killer inside.
A father, who can't keep his promises, dies in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman, who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.
An unimpressive, every-day man is forced into a situation where he is told to kill a politician to save his kidnapped daughter.
After an encounter with a neck-biter, a publishing executive thinks that he's turning into a vampire.
A sheltered young high society woman joins the army on a whim and finds herself in a more difficult situation than she ever expected.
A story of slavery, set in the 1930s American South.
A man meets up with two "good guys" to recover what is unlawfully his, taking them on his whirlwind ride, doing things they never would have imagined, just to survive.
A thief turned ex-con poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.
Businessman Wesley Deeds is jolted out of his scripted life when he meets Lindsey, a single mother who works on the cleaning crew in his office building.
A strange lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.
The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.
The friends of a night watchman, at a highly secured self storage facility, are home from college and looking to party.
When young girls start to go missing within a religious cult, older followers fear a long-told prophecy while the younger members suspect abusive elders are killing them off.
An eight year old boy is thought to be lazy and a troublemaker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.
A Miami businesswoman adjusts to her new life in a tiny Minnesota town.
On a trip to a Mexican border town, three college friends stumble upon a human-sacrifice cult.

On the night of a sleepover, a group of teenage girls venture out in a competitive game of challenging dares. As the antics escalate, and the dares become more extreme, the girls unravel the truth behind a former student's rumored suicide.
GRIFFIN AND PHOENIX is a poignantly funny love story about two people who face a seemingly insurmountable obstacle that may stand between them and a last chance at love.

Kate and Martin escape from personal tragedy to an Island Retreat. Cut off from the outside world, their attempts to recover are shattered when a Man is washed ashore, with news of airborne killer disease that is sweeping through Europe.
A compilation of interviews, rehearsals and backstage footage of Michael Jackson as he prepared for his series of sold-out shows in London.
A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.
When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.
Aliens abduct all adults; genius Jimmy and his friends build an interstellar spacefleet and rescue them.
An American woman, trapped in Islamic Iran by her brutish husband, must find a way to escape with her daughter as well.
A deadly drought in 1942 takes its toll on central China's Henan province during the war against Japan.
A landscape architect's dealings with a young thief cause him to re-evaluate his life.
A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.
Dr. Caligari's somnambulist, Cesare, and his deadly predictions.
After a one night stand with Isabel, Alex realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.
Strangers looking for a woman's father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately searches for the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.

Two childhood friends, a New York hairstylist and a would-be musician, get caught up with the mob and are forced to deliver $50,000 to Australia, but things go haywire when the money is lost to a wild kangaroo.
A filmmaker (van den Driessche) holds a series of boundary-pushing auditions for his project about female pleasure.
Ambitious singer must struggle with her musical career, her love life and to bring up her daughter by herself.
A secret service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the president. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a relentless FBI agent.
A single African-American mother struggles to clear her name after being wrongly accused and arrested for dealing drugs in an impoverished town in Texas.
A series of short films set around the theme of infidelity.
A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.
A young man, broke and jobless, abducts three rich college kids to try and get money from their fathers.
A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.
Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

Worried that he has gotten the free-spirited Mindy pregnant after an unprotected one-night stand, Fred feigns romantic interest and sticks by her side for twelve hours to make sure she takes both doses of the morning-after pill.
In Hamburg, German-Greek chef Zinos unknowingly disturbs the peace in his locals-only restaurant by hiring a more talented chef.
A businessman is reunited with the four lost souls who were his guardian angels during childhood, all with a particular purpose to joining the afterlife.
An Arab surgeon living in Tel Aviv discovers a dark secret about his wife in the aftermath of a suicide bombing.
The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.
A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors 40 years into the future.

Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.
When geek Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the exam system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.
A small Maryland town is gripped by a curse which causes residents to take their own life one after another.
An adventure set in the early part of the 20th century and focused on a popular novelist and her dealings with would-be suitors, the cops, monsters, and other distractions.
A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.
Desperate to get out from under her overprotective mother, a home-schooled teen runs off to live with her dad, and forms a bond with his much-younger boyfriend.
A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.
A washed up pitcher flashes through his career.
When talk radio host Emma Lloyd advises one of her listeners to break up with her boyfriend, the jilted ex sets about getting his revenge.
A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.
Shipwrecked on an island, the castaway boys eventually revert to savagery despite the few rational kids' attempts to prevent that.
While traveling across country with her fiance, Beth wakes alone in an isolated clinic to a mother's worst nightmare. Just how far will she go to save her child?
A woman snoops through her boyfriend's palm pilot and reveals his former girlfriends, which causes her to question why they're still listed in his little black book.
